response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its high value to you, I propose a purchase price of $12,000. This offer allows you to secure the product at a price slightly above my personal valuation while still providing a substantial benefit compared to its worth to you. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this transaction a reality.", "product_price": 12000}
